trans-unit.source: Contains the information returned when a peer requests the settings for a peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 包含对等解析程序请求对等解析程序服务的设置时返回的信息。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are primarily used to pass service settings response information from the resolver service to a network client of that service.
trans-unit.target: 此类的实例主要用于从解析程序服务到该服务的网络客户端传递服务设置信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo" /> 类的新默认实例。

trans-unit.source: The default value of `control` is set to true.
trans-unit.target: `control` 的默认值设置为了 true。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether referrals are passed by the resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 指示解析程序服务是否传递引用的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo" /> class with the supplied referral policy value.
trans-unit.target: 利用所提供的引用策略值初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether referrals are passed by the resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置解析程序服务是否传递引用。

trans-unit.source: True if referrals from peers participating in the mesh are passed; false if they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递来自网络中的对等解析程序的引用，则为 true；如果忽略这些引用，则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the body of the message containing a serialized instance of this type is correctly formed.
trans-unit.target: 指示包含此类型的序列化实例的消息其正文格式是否正确。

trans-unit.source: True if the service settings response information body is correctly-formed by the sender; false if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果发送方发送的服务设置响应信息的正文格式正确，则为 true；否则，为 false。
